title: [Medicine] A 20-year Australian study (n=615) has found no evidence to suggest cannabis reduces illicit opioid use, and it may not be an effective long-term method of reducing harm for those with an opioid use disorder or problematic use of opioids

[Health] In vivo reprogramming that spares the liver and intestine shows reduced toxicity in mice, yields valuable insights into the potential of in vivo reprogramming for rejuvenation and regeneration
